sourcesContent:
We are in Home component


import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {AuthService} from "../auth.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } isShow: boolean = false; public logined(){ this.authService.login(); this.isShow = true; } public logouted(){ this.authService.logout(); } }
